name: Riskit (MichaelMonty)
description:
Survive against endless waves of killer rectangles.

Between waves, choose if you want a powerup.

The powerup may help you, or it may help your enemies.

Will you risk it?

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow Keys/WASD: Shoot, Navigate menus
  • Pause: Enter
  • Key numbers 1, 2, 3 and 4: Select options

- Created by Elwood Games for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam

CREDITS:
